features: Optimum Comfort: PC headphones with plush, padded headband and earcups
Enhanced Audio: Experience premium sound quality. System requirements: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 or later, Chrome OS or MAC OS X (10.2.8 or later), with USB-A port
Noise-Cancelling Qualities: A rotating microphone that minimizes background noise for clear calls, Frequency response (Headset): 20 Hz - 20 KHz

Advanced digital USB: Laser-tuned drivers provide enhanced digital audio. This plug-and-play headset can be used with any PC or Mac computer with a USB-A port or adapter without any software installation
In-Line Controls: Adjust the volume and mute your mic via the headset cable
USB Connectivity: Plug-and-play when you are ready with a simple USB connection
Upgrade to Logitech H540 headset for high-definition sound and on-ear controls
Works with Chromebook: This product is tested and certified as works with Chromebook, which means it meets Google’s compatibility standards and works seamlessly with your Chromebook

NOTE: If the headset is not working Please adjust the headset volume on the cable control. Make sure the headset is not on mute. The mute light flashes when mute has been activated. Check the USB cable connection to your computer. Try a different USB port on your computer. Connect directly to your computer. Do not use a USB hub.
body.description: Experience clear internet calls a with simple plug-and-play USB connection and a noise-canceling mic. Rigid left-sided mic boom is moveable and can be tucked out of the way when you're not using it. In-line controls let you control volume or mute without interrupting calls. Laser-tuned drivers deliver enhanced digital audio from your favorite music and games.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CRYSTAL CLEAR AUDIO Experience clear calls and video meetings with H390. Fine-tuned 30 mm audio drivers deliver enhanced digital stereo audio for work and play.

ROTATING NOISE-CANCELING MIC Minimizes unwanted background noise for clear conversations. Rigid, left-sided mic can be positioned for better voice capture. Rotating boom can be tucked out of the way when you’re not using it.

HANDY IN-LINE CONTROLS Simple in-line controls on the cable let you easily adjust the volume or mute calls without disruption. PADDED COMFORT Adjustable headband features swivel-mounted, leatherette ear cushions for hours of comfort. Easy to clean, too.

USB-A PLUG-AND-PLAY This plug-and-play headset can be used without the need to install software. Simply plug the USB-A connector into your computer and you’re ready to talk or listen right away. MOVE FREELY WITH LONG CABLE The 6.23 ft (1.9 m) cable is just the right length to give you the freedom to stand up and stretch during long conversations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, quality USB headset at a great price
reviews.reviewText: What you see is what you get here: a solid-feeling quality USB headset at a great price. The USB cord is long enough to use in a variety of circumstances and the ear pieces are reasonably comfortable, though obviously not as comfortable as dedicated headphones or ear pieces would be. But you're not going to find those things at this price point, which is the key selling feature here. It's obviously intended for occasional use on a work telecommuting laptop and for that it gives fine service.The only downside is the slightly odd placement of the headset volume buttons. They are on the edges of a round insert about 1/4 the way down the cord from the headset which I'm going to bet you're going to find is either too close or too far away. For me, it was too far away, and sometimes results in the insert being pressed up against the edge of my desk if I'm wearing the headset near the desk. On a couple of occasions, this has resulted in the desk either pressing the mute button or pressing one or the other volume buttons. So it's something to watch out for. There is a thin clip on the insert if you want to clip it somewhere where it will stay out of the way.All in all, if you're looking at this item, you're looking for quality sound for an inexpensive cost and that's exactly what you're getting here. Not a lot of frills, but it should give good service for several years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Immerse Yourself in Audio Excellence: Logitech H390 Wired Headset
reviews.reviewText: The Logitech H390 Wired Headset is a remarkable audio solution that has completely transformed my PC and laptop experience. With its immersive sound quality, noise-canceling microphone, convenient in-line controls, and broad compatibility, this headset proves to be an outstanding companion for both work and entertainment purposes.Sound Quality:The audio performance of the Logitech H390 is truly impressive. The stereo headphones deliver rich and balanced sound, immersing me in my favorite music, movies, and games. The headset's wide frequency response captures every detail, ensuring a captivating and enjoyable listening experience. Whether I'm working on a project, watching videos, or indulging in gaming sessions, the audio quality is consistently exceptional.Noise-Canceling Microphone:The built-in noise-canceling microphone is a standout feature of the H390. It effectively filters out background noise, allowing for clear and uninterrupted communication. Whether I'm participating in online meetings, engaging in voice chats, or recording audio, the microphone delivers crisp and intelligible sound. It ensures that my voice is accurately captured while minimizing distractions from ambient noise, enhancing the overall communication experience.Convenience and Controls:The Logitech H390 is designed with convenience in mind. The in-line controls allow me to adjust the volume, mute the microphone, and answer or end calls with ease. These intuitive controls put essential functions at my fingertips, eliminating the need to navigate through software or use keyboard shortcuts. It enhances my productivity and ensures a seamless user experience.Broad Compatibility:The H390 headset is incredibly versatile and compatible with various devices. Whether I'm using a PC or a laptop, it effortlessly connects via USB, eliminating the hassle of dealing with separate audio jacks. Moreover, the headset works flawlessly with Chromebooks, expanding its usability across different platforms. The broad compatibility makes it a versatile choice for users with different devices or those who require flexibility in their audio setup.Comfort and Durability:The Logitech H390 excels in terms of comfort, allowing for extended use without discomfort or fatigue. The plush ear cups and adjustable headband provide a secure and comfortable fit, ensuring that I can wear the headset for extended periods without any discomfort. Additionally, the headset's build quality is excellent, with durable materials that withstand daily use, making it a reliable choice for long-term usage.In conclusion, the Logitech H390 Wired Headset offers a superb audio experience, seamless communication, convenient controls, and wide compatibility. Whether you're working, gaming, or enjoying multimedia content, this headset delivers exceptional sound quality and user-friendly features. Its noise-canceling microphone, comfortable design, and durable construction make it an excellent investment for PC and laptop users. I highly recommend the Logitech H390 for its superior performance and the immersive audio experience it provides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great but ear pieces are painful if you work in a call center for 8 hours a day
reviews.reviewText: These are exactly as advertised, but I do want to warn fellow Call Center workers bc the ear pieces are smaller than even my tiny girl ears so it squishes the earlobes. After several hours of wearing this my ears are red and in severe pain. I cannot wear my blue light glasses with these at all in order to protect my eyes bc it makes the pain unbearable after less than 1 hour. These are GREAT with excellent sound quality both in the ear piece and recording through the mic for call center jobs, sales, or other phone from home/remote phone positions. The only ding is comfort. I've bought headphone earpiece adapters and so the noise canceling isn't as good for me, but the sound output is still goodish, but the mic is still excellent and now I can use them all day with no issues. That being said, it's still worth it, I just don't understand the high price. There are plenty of other models that are comparable but more comfortable and at a lower price. I bought this specific model bc my job said to, but now LITERALLY everyone in the training course who bought this model like I did is complaining about ear pain, so it's not just me; It's everyone. I gave 4 stars bc it's not the seller's fault and the seller was great! They were honest in the representation and even shipped quickly. The product its self deserves 2 stars bc what is the point of headphones you can't use without buying additional parts to use? And at this price point, it just doesn't seem right to me, BUT this seller offered this product at a lower price than other sellers so again the seller does deserve a good rating. I trust the seller and recommend them, but not the product bc of comfort issues. The product is decent for sound quality as is without adapters. It's a toss up for you as the potential buyers to decide if you want to adapt the headphones for comfort, which is a quick and easy fix. Either way, I recommend the seller and will probably purchase other items from this seller in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent sound, comfortable to wear for hours.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this as a replacement for the same product as my old one broke when my spouse sat on it. I used the old one for over 10 years. I hope to get a similar amount of use from the replacement. I like that it is a USB headset, making it easy to plug into my computer. While a 3.5 mm plug works, it is difficult to plug it into the back of the computer. The sound quality is fine. It may not be up to listening to music critically, but it is more than adequate for zoom meetings and streaming video. The mike works ok and does a good job of noise cancellation. The cord is long and lets you sit comfortably away from the monitor.
Muito bom som, leve, confortável ,acabamento premium, muito legal. Valeu mesmo!

Flexible head band. Helps for extra large head.Good speakers, good mic, good everything, really.Ridiculously low price.I use them A LOT. Like, daily. For work and gaming. They usually last around 2 years. About to buy my 3rd set.(Those on my head are beginning to show signs of weakness. The left ear occasionally stops/starts... a bad contact. 30$+ for 26+ months of heavy usage : I don't mind at all ! And I'll keep on new ones in their packaging untill the one I'm using fully die...)No regrets. Would(will) buy again !

reviews.reviewTitle: Son bastante comodos y el microfono se escucha muy claro para el precio que maneja.
reviews.reviewText: Me gusto mucho la facilidad de uso del boton, el color el super lindo y puedo usarlos varias horas sin sentir molestia, aparte de que aislan muy bien el sonido.
Llegó en tiempo y forma; cómodos de usar y lo que llevo en probarlos, son problemas los ultimos 3 meses.Solo conectarlos al puerto y reconocimiento automático. Recomendables.
Le uso già da un po', per ora tutto bene. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo. Spero durino a lungo. Consigliatissime.
